H0.text: Who was made Archbishop of Capetown in 1986. Desmond Tutu

H1.text: Who was made Archbishop of Capetown in 1986. Beyers Naude

H2.text: Who was made Archbishop of Capetown in 1986. Allan Boesak

H3.text: Who was made Archbishop of Capetown in 1986. Mpilo

A4.text: In 1985, Tutu became the Bishop of Johannesburg and in 1986 the Archbishop of Cape Town
